resources.string: "The bear's legs are thick, the head is massive with small ears and eyes. The fur of the animal is thick and smooth, brown-brown in color. With one blow, he is capable of killing even someone stronger than himself. Large, strong claws on all paws help catch prey. The bear likes insects, fish, hunts roe deer and deer. It rarely eats grass, nuts, and various berries."

"A fox is a beautiful animal. Her body is covered with thick red fur. The fox has a luxurious fluffy tail. She has short legs and a sharp face. The fox's eyes are like beads, glowing with cunning fire."

"A wolf is a predatory forest dweller that belongs to the canine family. Even in appearance, the wolf is very similar to a large dog. Only his tail is always down and his pointed ears either stick up or are pressed to his head, but never hang down like a dog's."
